alert.note: Alert for Kodiak Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 01 at 8:56PM AKST until January 02 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Kodiak Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult due to blowing snow and blizzard conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Bands of snow have developed over the waters near Kodiak Island. These bands of snow are expected to move over northern parts of the Island this evening and slowly shift west through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel very hazardous. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you.If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
